overview: WHAC is the most popular erotic themed TV channel on the air, but its president, Mr. Blackman, fears that competition from other sexually charged stations could risk harming their ratings as has thus assembled his entire creative team for a sneak preview of all of the new programs set to air, to make sure that each one is up to the high standards expected from his viewersâ€¦
tagline: The Network That Turns You On
title: Naughty Network
